name: The Pony Remark Quiz | 'Seinfeld' - Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What sport does Jerry play in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Softball.

	Jerry catches a fly ball and sends his team to the finals.  Jerry's family is at his apartment in the meantime.

questions.text: What did Jerry's father once invent?
questions.explanation:
A beltless trenchcoat.

	We later learn that the trench coat is named "The Executive" when Kramer and Morty sell the remaining stock to a clothing store.

questions.text: Jerry sits beside Uncle Leo at the dinner party.
questions.explanation:
True.

	Jerry states that he doesn't want to sit beside Uncle Leo, but at the party, he doesn't get his request fulfilled.

questions.text: Who has to sit at the small table at the dinner party?
questions.explanation:
Elaine.

	Jerry asks Elaine if she wants to trade seats, but she stays where she is despite the fact that she hates the spot.

Wednesday.

	Manya dies after the dinner party and Jerry thinks that his pony remark may have killed her.

Poland.

	In Poland, Manya had her own pony, so when Jerry made the remark, she was mad.  Everyone was shocked to hear him say that he hated anyone who grew up with a pony.

questions.text: What is the name of Jerry's cousin who works in Central Park?
questions.explanation:
Jeffrey & Jeffery.

	Uncle Leo doesn't stop talking about Jeffrey in this episode because of his idea to send people on a tour to eat edible plants in the park.  Jeffrey moves into Manya's apartment after she dies.

questions.text: Who does not go to Manya's funeral?
questions.explanation:
Kramer.

	Jerry and Elaine go to apologize to Manya's husband after the remark.  His softball game gets rained out while he's at the funeral, so he doesn't miss the game, but he's kicked off the team.

Jerry.

	Jerry has barely known the woman, and he finally visits her the day before she died.  Apparently, she wasn't interested in the pony remark after the dinner although Jerry was nervous about it.

questions.text: Does George appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	George appears in Monk's Restaurant during this episode.
